description:
I've installed ubuntu 12.10 cloud version, and im trying to setup Grizzly release. The strange thing which i found was in the "nova-volume" package i see only the below files

root@cloud:/etc/nova# dpkg -L nova-volume
/.
/usr
/usr/share
/usr/share/doc
/usr/share/doc/nova-volume
/usr/share/doc/nova-volume/changelog.Debian.gz
/usr/share/doc/nova-volume/copyright


files mentioned below seems to be missing.

/etc/default/nova-volume
/etc/init.d/nova-volume
/etc/init/nova-volume.conf
/etc/logrotate.d/nova-volume
/etc/nova/rootwrap.d/volume.filters
/etc/tgt/conf.d/nova_tgt.conf
/usr/bin/nova-volume
title: nova-volume package problem

comments.content:

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~deepakmdass88

comments.content: nova-volume is not supported in grizzly please use cinder.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zulcss

comments.content:
